text:
@NYGovCuomo Least you can do is step down from your high horse and tell #NewYork the truth.

Least thing you could do is send #EMS services to #LowIncome community to clean up all the #DeadBodies still laying there from the #WuhanVirus coming through.
#VoterIDNow 
#Trump2020NowMoreThanEver
